name: Witch Path
description:
Game developed for "The GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022" with the theme "Death is only the beginning!"

My first (and extremely simple) game using Unity Game Platform.

Keep the Little Witch flying with mouse click or Left+Ctrl.

Thanks to Jason Weimann' s "How to Make a Video Game - #1 - For Beginners (2019)" tutorial (that I used as the base for this game)

and Chris' Tutorials "2D Top Down Pixel Art RPG Game Dev in Unity2022 ~ Crash Course Tutorial for Beginners" (another source of knowledge).

I would never figure out how to make text scroll works without Alexxander Zotov's  "How to make scrollable UI (user interface) text area in Unity game | Quick Unity 2D tutorial"
